summary: The module defines data classes that encapsulate configuration parameters for primer and probe design using Primer3. These classes store user-specified constraints such as size ranges, melting temperatures, GC content, homopolymer limits, and thermodynamic thresholds, and provide methods to convert these settings into Primer3 input tags for downstream processing.
business_intent: To provide a structured way to define, validate, and translate primer and probe design constraints into the format required by Primer3, facilitating consistent and reproducible PCR assay design.
